Package core

Class PetrinetAnalyser

java.lang.Object
core.PetrinetAnalyser
public class PetrinetAnalyser extends Object

Class holding methods for analyzing a petrinet and returning results..

The petrinet can either be passed as a pnml file or as an instance of PetrinetViewerController. The former also modifies the reachability graph in the provided instance.
